summary:
14. Demands Forces nouvelles proceed with DDR programme.

15. Affirms identification process must start without delay.

16. Demands Ivorian parties stop incitement to hatred & violence.

17. Demands militias disarmament & dismantling.

18. Demands Ivorian parties refrain from violence & force.

19. Urges countries to prevent cross-border combatants & arms movement.

20. Reiterates concern at human rights & humanitarian law violations.

21. Condemns attacks on UNOCI personnel & demands cooperation.

22. Takes note of Peace & Security Council decision & intends to review UNOCI troop level.

23. Supports individual measures against those blocking peace process.

24. Urges International Working Group & sanctions committee to monitor progress.

25. Decides to remain seized of the matter.
